Flow.description: This flow runs daily and checks the difference between the current date and the last time the add-on stage was changed, then sends the corresponding auto-email
Flow.label: Add-On | Scheduled | Send Auto Emails

value.stringValue: It has been 4 weeks and this plan still have the incorrect access level for their integration. Please follow up with client.
Follow Up on Additional Access - 2nd Warning
This plan still have the incorrect access level for their integration. Please follow up with client.

textTemplates.name: ceCaseDesc
textTemplates.text: The Payroll team has not heard back from the client about setting up their EPS payroll integration. Can you please reach out to the sponsor(s) to see if they are still interested in setting up Payroll Integration?
